sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; import { RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule, RouterModule], templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { ngOnInit() { // Add Inter font const link = document.createElement('link'); link.href = 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600;700&display=swap'; link.rel = 'stylesheet'; document.head.appendChild(link); } }
